Package ro.ubb.olympics.repository.xml

Class AbstractXmlRepository<ID,​T extends BaseEntity<ID>>

java.lang.Object
ro.ubb.olympics.repository.inmemory.InMemoryRepository<ID,​T>
ro.ubb.olympics.repository.xml.AbstractXmlRepository<ID,​T>
Type Parameters:
ID - the type of the ID of the stored entities
T - the type of the entity to be stored
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<ID,​T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AthleteXmlRepository, CompetitionXmlRepository, ParticipationXmlRepository, SponsorshipXmlRepository, SponsorXmlRepository
public abstract class AbstractXmlRepository<ID,​T extends BaseEntity<ID>>
extends InMemoryRepository<ID,​T>
Abstract XML repository.

      Add a child to a node and set its text content.
      Parameters:
      document - the document on which the node is added.
      parent - the parent node to which the child node should be added.
      tagName - the tag of the child node.
      textContent - the text content of the child node.
